nodes.text: Cory Herndon was a Court Archivist of Velmor during the New Republic. He was the author of Velmor: Royalty and Rebellion, a compilation of historical documents. He also cataloged "Arbra: Sanctuary in the Storm".
Cory Herndon was named after the out-of-universe author of Velmor: Royalty and Rebellion, Cory J. Herndon.
